subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Even as he pursues Mark Teixeira, Theo Epstein, the general manager of the Boston Red Sox, disputed the notion that the team typically matches the Yankees’ expensive moves.
snippet: Even as he pursues Mark Teixeira, Theo Epstein, the general manager of the Boston Red Sox, disputed the notion that the team typically matches the Yankees’ expensive moves.
